backend.physics
Interface BallPhysics

All Superinterfaces:
PiecePhysics
All Known Subinterfaces:
Ball
All Known Implementing Classes:
Ball, Ball3D
public interface BallPhysics
extends PiecePhysics

BallPhysics - represents a 3-dimensional ball in space to be used in the Gizmoball game - MAKE SURE EVERYTHING THAT IS JAVA3D returns new objects

Author:
Ragu Vijaykumar
